comments.body: I wonder if this should be the opposite - opt in to log serving. There is probably more usage that wouldn't want this on by default than the other way around (e.g. running locally).

This is only ON by default for `LocalExecutor` and `SequentialExecutor` though. And kept this behaviour to replicate what we have on it our Worker (`airflow celery worker`) - https://airflow.apache.org/docs/apache-airflow/stable/cli-and-env-variables-ref.html#worker
Ah, consistency with worker makes sense. I don't have a strong opinion here, just when looking at scheduler in isolation the default seems backwards to me.
